inclusion.criterion: ASA I-III patients admitted for DL surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: neonatal jaundice that may require phototherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled hypertension (MAP > 100 mmHg) or ischaemic heart disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Predicted difficult airway, laryngoscopy and intubation time > 30 sec, more than one attempt of intubation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to the drugs used
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
